params._counterpart: The address of `L2ETHGateway` contract in L2.
params._messenger: The address of `L1ScrollMessenger` contract in L1.
params._router: The address of `L1GatewayRouter` contract in L1.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be deposited.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.gasLimit: Gas limit required to complete the deposit on L2.
params.to: The address of recipient's account on L2.

finalizeWithdrawETH(address,address,uint.details: This function should only be called by L1ScrollMessenger.      This function should also only be called by L1ETHGateway in L2.

params.amount: The amount of ETH to withdraw.
params.data: Optional data to forward to recipient's account.
params.from: The address of account who withdraw ETH in L2.
params.to: The address of recipient in L1 to receive ETH.

initialize(address,address,address).details: The parameters `_counterpart`, `_router` and `_messenger` are no longer used.

params._counterpart: The address of L2ETHGateway in L2.
params._messenger: The address of L1ScrollMessenger in L1.
params._router: The address of L1GatewayRouter in L1.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

counterpart().notice: The address of corresponding L1/L2 Gateway contract.

depositETH(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH to some recipient's account in L2.

depositETH(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit ETH to caller's account in L2.

depositETHAndCall(address,uint256,bytes,.notice: Deposit ETH to some recipient's account in L2 and call the target contract.

finalizeWithdrawETH(address,address,uint.notice: Complete ETH withdraw from L2 to L1 and send fund to recipient's account in L1.

messenger().notice: The address of corresponding L1ScrollMessenger/L2ScrollMessenger contract.
